channel.title: A Reason To Wake Up, January 2023
channel.description: Daniel Kitson's new, live breakfast show. Each week day in January. This is an unofficial feed.

image.title: A Reason To Wake Up, January 2023

item.title: artwu_2023_01_02
item.description:
Originally broadcast on ResonanceFM 7am-9am, 02/01/2023
https://www.resonancefm.com/
https://www.danielkitson.com/
Tracklist:
1. Yard Act - 100% Endurance 2. Anna B Savage - InFLUX 3. Bess Atwell - Co-op 4. Albertine Sarges - Free Today 5. Fake Dad - How Do I Cry? 6. Wet Leg - Wet Dream 7. LYR - Great Coat (Instrumental Version) 8. We Shall Over Come (Robag Wruhme RMX-Edit.22) 9. Charlotte Adig√©ry & Bolis Pupul - Blenda 10. Orchestre Tout Puissant Marcel Duchamp - So Many Things (To Feel Guilty About) 11. Loyle Carner - Hate 12. Brian Eno & David Byrne - Strange Overtones 13. Melt Yourself Down - Pray For Me I Don't Fit In 14. Robag Wruhme - Ende 15. Yard Act - Pour Another 16. Emanative & Bex Burch - Disrupt #4 17. Matt Sweeney & Bonnie "Prince" Billy - Resist the Urge 18. H. Hawkline - Suppression Street 19. Little Simz - Gorilla 20 Sti Nami - Bayer X

item.title: artwu_2023_01_03
item.description:
Originally broadcast on ResonanceFM 7am-9am, 03/01/2023
https://www.resonancefm.com/
https://www.danielkitson.com/
Tracklist:
1. Robag Wruhme - K.T.B. 2. St. Vincent - Piggy 3. LCD Soundsystem - new body rhumba (from the film White Noise) 4. Lewsberg - Six Hills 5. The Lucksmiths - Great Lengths 6. Oliver Sim - Romance With a Memory 7. Folly Group - Fewer Closer Friends 8. St. Vincent - Piggy 9. Dee-Lite - Groove Is In The Heart 10. Albertine Sarges - The Girls 11. Iron & Wine - The Trapeze Swinger 12. Tune-Yards - make it right. 13. Depeche Mode - Lilian (Robag Wruhme Slomoschen Kikker) 14. Sault - Up All Night 15. Nixer - People Feel 16. Wu-Lu - South (feat. Lex Amor) 17. Kings of Convenience - Love Is A Lonely Thing (feat. Feist) 18. The Postal Service - Such Great Heights 19. Villagers - Love Came with All That It Brings 20. LCD Soundsystem - Losing My Edge
